phrases: There are those who absolutely refused to stop pushing forward.
On occasion, they become one with their personal convictions, transforming into karma itself.
These beings, who while human, have also transcended humanity,
and continue to watch over everything with the gaze of inhuman eyes.
Everyone, unable to resist, goes down in
Make those eyes shine brighter than a torch
The destination we are aiming for is deep
We squarely lose our way
The trap of the open-mouthed netherworld
Let us chase the traces of truth
If an answer can be found now, we do not mind losing it all
The echo is still reverberating
So that we do not part with that voice
The compass is always
Pointed to the darkness
Where there is no escape
In that direction
Even if that is a curse
The pulse is the real thing
Never again will the yearning stop
The very best of the cave raiders: the White Whistles.
Armed with Relics of the netherworld they have personally excavated,
they are each known by titles that uniquely personify them.
the Unmovable Sovereign, Ozen the Immovable.
So then, are the stories about how she pulled up a gondola with 30 people inside,
or how she supported a boulder that was 10 meters across, all really true?
Those are rumors, purely rumors.
However, one thing is certain: such rumors have been whispered about her for a full 50 years.
50 years?!
So that means...
50 years ago she was already a White Whistle?!
She truly is the Unmovable Sovereign.
What an amazing person.
However...
Hey, Habo, just what Relic is it that Ozen's armed with?
I cannot tell you that.
Do not give me that face.
White Whistles are the trump cards of this here city of the pit.
Until their whistles return home, that information will not be made public.
Dang.
Ozen...
I do not think there is any way she would tell them about the Vessel...
but I am still nervous.
Perhaps I should have gone with them despite their objections after all.
I am counting on you, Reg.
If it comes down to it, you are the only one who can protect her.
What is this cube here?
This pattern is incredibly complex...
Seems to be at least a grade-2 Relic.
But, in the guide to recorded Relics...
Right, it is not listed.
It is something that Lyza personally bought before it could be auctioned off.
I am the one who carried it here, though.
Could this be... the Curse-Repelling Vessel?
You are half right.
The Curse-Repelling Vessel.
From the depths up toward the surface...
When living creatures that could not make that trip were placed inside it and carried up,
they were not affected by the strain of ascending and did not die, which is why it got the name it did.
But, that is not actually right.
In fact, whatever's placed inside still gets affected by the Curse and dies.
However, it starts moving around.
It was thanks to you that I came to understand that.
Huh?
You were stillborn, you know.
When Lyza delivered you, you were already dead.
Basically, you were a real annoyance, so I shoved you inside this thing, but you somehow started to move.
Yesterday, I got nostalgic, and I tried putting some of the meat I cook dinner with in there...
The thing got loose and ran around.
After a while, it stopped moving.
But actually, one half of it continued to move, you see.
Hey...
I wonder how long you will last...
Besides that, both you - after you started to move back then - and the meat I put in there yesterday...
attempted to head for the center of the Abyss for some reason.
Hey, why is that?
You of all people might have an idea...
Are not you essentially the same as that meat?
Master... stop this.
Why...?
The things you are saying...
It is about time you get the picture.
I despise you.
What is it, you Aubade child?
Your story is quite interesting...
but do not hurt Riko any more than you already have.
Any way you look at it, you are really immature, Ozen!
I used to hear that a lot.
Hey, boy, do you have a conception of God?
What are you saying all of a sudden?!
The people around here, you see, do not really believe in God.
Instead, do you know what it is they believe in?
The answer is this place - the Abyss itself.
Precisely because the bottom of the netherworld is unknown, and because it is feared,
it has the power to become their God.
If it was easy to head down and return back home,
the value of Relics and faith in the Abyss would quite possibly be shaken to the core.
The reason Aubades are not listed in the guide...
is not because they have not been discovered.
It is because they simply must not exist, you see.
What is with this strength of hers?
My arm was creaking!
Hey, did I hear that you lost your memory?
Well, I am truly glad.
I need to dispose of you before you remember anything.
I-I will go check on the telescope...
Marulk!
Stay right there.
Y-you cannot be serious!
As if I would let things end in a place like this!
I will make you let us go even if I have to use brute force!
I will let you go...
After you have ceased moving, that is!
This is not stopping her at all!
What the heck is she?!
This does not break or get any thinner.
I wonder if a bunch of strands are all packed into the same area...
Well, whatever.
Have it back.
Oh?
You are lighter than I thought.
So your sturdiness is your big appeal, right?
Let us test it out.
Oops.
I busted the floor.
O-o-ouch...
You have really... done it now...
You are a lot tougher than the floor, huh?
I wonder how much more you can take...
Stop!
Reg...
Reg will break!
You are in the way.
Riko!
Riko!
There is so much blood...
Sorry, Marulk...
This is not an opponent I can hold back on.
If I do not get serious, I am done for!
What is it you are going to show me?
If I just let it rip like last time, the whole Seeker Camp could burn down...
Calm down...
Refine it... thinner... sharper...!
So, I see that you breathe and blink even though you are just a mechanical doll.
That means you, too, will be probably be hunted by beasts.
Hey, what happens when this thing hits something?
Let us test it out.
Oh my, incredible, is not it?
It blasts straight through.
I have never seen a weapon like this before.
Irredeemable!
You are irredeemable, Ozen!
What is with your arm...?
Is something embedded inside it?
This here?
They are called Thousand-Men Wedges.
I inserted them at 120 points or so all around my body...
They are the secret to my vigor.
For as much as you criticize me, you are quite superhuman yourself, Ozen!
I fuss over lots of things.
I am old, after all.
R-Reg!
R-Reg!
You are so noisy.
If you think he is so precious, you should have kept him locked away.
For some reason he went limp all of a sudden, but that is alright, is not it?
Sooner or later, you will revert back to being a piece of meat, anyway.
Even just a little longer is okay!
But, together with Reg...
If it is not with Reg...
I cannot bear it!
Please, Reg!
Do not lose to her!
Riko...
That will not do.
Both of you are unfit for it.
Look, it fit right in there.
He woke up!
He is awake.
R-Riko...
Reg!
Reg!
Sorry, Reg!
Y-you moved!
Do not leave me like that!
Did I just collapse and leave Riko all alone here...?!
Reg!
Riko is...!
Riko is in your hands now!
Damn it...
Ah, that one's crying too now!
Ozen has made yet another one cry.
Poor things...
Wh-who the heck...
a-are you guys?!
You mean us?
We are Subterranean Bandits, Ozen's cave raider squad.
They are a bunch of good-for-nothings with nowhere to call home on the surface.
They were told to stay out of it, but Marulk called them here, you see.
YOU-um...
Along with a brat who cannot do anything but cry and make a fuss,
we have got a mechanical doll who fires his weapon without even thinking and then faints...
While those two did not even make a single correct decision,
you acted in the most appropriate manner to save your friends.
That is my apprentice for you.
As punishment for disobeying my orders, I will string you up naked later, though.
Ozen told us to stay hidden while the two kiddies are here.
But the ground shook countless times.
And this kid also started sobbing and came rushing over to us.
I-is that right...?
Marulk... I am sorry.
I know you said you wanted to test Lyza's child, but you really overdid it.
Wh-what do you mean by that?!
Just what it sounds like.
Are you saying that was all... j-just some act?!
I am being serious.
If I do not go all out, I will not get the point across, will I?
I hate deceiving children, you know.
Th-then...
that part about disposing of the Aubade was...?
I never had any intention of doing that, of course.
It is just that you are too sturdy.
No matter how many times I hit you, you were not breaking, so I got more and more into it.
The primeval creatures that inhabit the deeper parts of the Abyss are far more cunning and tough than I am.
You will not be able to protect that girl.
Marulk, please tend to the boy.
If he is able to fill his belly with human food, then human medicine should probably work, too.
If it does not work, just feed him a lot.
O-okay!
Today's lesson is over.
I have some tidying up to do, you see.
Hey, you are already here now, so come on and lend me a hand.
Alrighty.
If you continue pushing on at your current skill level, you will just end up as poor meals or little seedbeds.
Other than that, you will just be a stain on the ground or some wall.
That said, there is no guarantee you will not end up like that as I am trying to beat you into shape...
Oh, that is right.
There is one thing I was deceiving you about.
That grave I spoke of...
No one was buried there.
It is true.
Did you really think I would not dig it up and see for myself?
Lyza is waiting for you.
You at least need to give it a shot.
Riko?
Ozen...
Ozen!
Ozen.
What is up with your hair?
Oh, you again...
I have already kicked you twice but you still have not learned your lesson.
What an unusual one you are...
So, what is up with it, anyway?
It is to cover up my scars, you see.
As your mind comes under attack in the depths of the Abyss,
gradually the effects show up physically, too.
They do not manifest immediately like the sixth layer's Curse does,
but if you tread the boundaries of sanity as well as life and death each time you descend,
the skin on your head is bound to get all twisted.
I am just good at arranging my hair to fool everyone, you see.
How cool!
If you do not watch what you say, I will kick you again.
No, really.
That is cool!
Those scars are proof of your fortitude in continuing to challenge the netherworld,
even as it tried to break your mind.
Ozen the Immovable.
A genuine White Whistle.
Hey, will you be my mentor?
Ozen.
Look, Ozen.
I am already a Black Whistle.
Before long, I will catch up with you!
You have got some nerve to say that considering you cried when I hit you last night.
Very well, then.
If that is the case, let us just hurry up and go.
Starting tomorrow, the strain of the fourth layer will make you she would tears of blood.
Now that is something to look forward to.
I would not have it any other way!
Ozen, your personality is irredeemable, but you are still the best mentor ever!
How are you feeling?
I am alright now.
The next large group of cave raiders arrives in three weeks.
I will only be able to try beating you into shape until then, whether or not it proves successful.
Where are we headed?
Somewhere even further than the Seeker Camp.
It is the outer edge of the Abyss, so to speak.
Out there, there is no worry of running into other cave raiders or having anyone come to your rescue.
It is ideal for training, you see.
Training...
Your first assignment is what I call survival training.
Most of the creatures are quite docile here,
perhaps because the force field's light does not make it here.
Even so, the creatures here can see in the dark, so keep your guard up.
Spend ten days here with the equipment you have got.
Show me you are able to survive.
Be sure not to go beyond that Pillar Tree.
I will consider that as trying to escape.
Well then, I am heading back now.
Huh?!
Do your best to protect this girl so that she does not return to being a corpse.
In addition, you cannot use that thing for these ten days.
My Incinerator?
Go ahead and use it if you want to get Riko killed.
What do you mean?
Once you fire it, no matter how you push yourself, you always faint after around ten minutes.
Then it is a full two hours until you wake up.
During that time, even if I punched you, slapped you against the floor,
or dunked you in water, you still did not get up.
Just try leaving a helpless child on her own in the second layer for two hours.
I wonder just how she will be torn to shreds and eaten...
Still, when you really do have to use it,
go all out to make sure whatever it is does not come after you again in the future.
No matter your opponent or whatever lies in the vicinity,
when the time comes, do not hesitate or show any mercy.
Otherwise, your adventure will be over in the blink of an eye.
The glittering waves that float in the sky
Let us bundle them and build a rainbow bridge
A dangerous foothold, a slope we slide on
A signpost of the past and future
Your left hand, with my right hand
Join it, connect us, and let us begin
I am always beside you
In the past, the present, and also the future
So let us walk along without hesitating
Pile up multicolored dreams
Where will we head toward tomorrow?
If I can be together with you, the world will begin to shine
Let us search for flowers that bloom at the ends of the earth
